snippet.title: Cursed Dawn | Launch Trailer | indie.io
snippet.description:
Get ready to unleash chaos and prepare for relentless zombie mayhem! Available April 7, 2025, on Steam!

💀 Out Now! ➤ https://bit.ly/CursedDawn

Cursed Dawn is a first-person wave survival shooter where no two rounds play the same. Face off against brutal zombie hordes across dynamic maps packed with secrets, environmental traps, and physics-driven carnage. Master the arenas, experiment with over two dozen weapons, and see how long you can survive when death is only ever moments away.

🧟 Survive waves of unpredictable zombie threats
🧨 Use environmental hazards and traps to your advantage
🔫 Unlock and wield over 24 powerful weapons
🗺️ Explore maps with hidden secrets and dynamic spawns

Visit indie.io on Steam ➤ https://bit.ly/indieiofranchise

#CursedDawn #ZombieShooter #FPS #WaveSurvival #IndieGame #Steam
